roles.leadership: Organized, decisive, and good at delegating. They thrive in planning, coordination, and team management.
roles.photography: Visual storytellers who enjoy capturing moments. Theyâ€™re patient, creative, and technically skilled.
roles.design: Detail-oriented and artistic. They enjoy layout, aesthetics, and making things visually appealing.
roles.sidebar: Curious and trend-savvy. They like bite-sized content, infographics, and adding flair to stories.
roles.journalist: Strong writers and communicators. They enjoy interviews, storytelling, and crafting compelling narratives.
roles.page finisher: Perfectionists who love polishing work. They excel in proofreading, organizing, and finalizing content.
